snippet.title: EleMetals: Death Metal Death Match! Launch Trailer (Official)
snippet.description:
EleMetals IS OUT NOW on Steam, Itch.io, and Humble Store for PC. 
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/11...
Itch.io: https://wallridegames.itch.io/elemetals

EleMetals: Death Metal Death Match is a chaotic explosion of demonic local-multiplayer mayhem! Summon one of SIX metalheads with elemental powers and SHRED YOUR FRIENDS!!! Witness the dynamic metal soundtrack by the demented audio brains at Fat Bard (Battle Chef Brigade, Crashlands, etc.) as the lines between gameplay and music blur into a demonic symphony of destruction!
